website_summaries.verdict: This is a well-made, infrared heat-only (no steam) sauna that heats up quickly (up to 140°F), with a more compact design than similar models.
pros: A great way to warm the body and provide overall relaxation, in an easily portable design
Remote control with timer (up to 60 min
Zippered opening allows for hands to hold items outside of the sauna
Infrared heat means no moisture-related problems as can happen with a steam sauna
cons: Some models quit working after only a few uses

customer_reviews.title: Very high EMFs
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed to have ordered this unit and tested the EMFs w/ my meter - Very high. If you are concerned about EMFs, do not purchase this item. I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'10 & 310 pounds, I a wide guy & I love this thing! I barely fit but I fit & boy was I sweating up a storm in there, i had this thing ready to use in about 30 seconds & I'm in love!
customer_reviews.author: king bibibear

customer_reviews.title: Starts on fire!
customer_reviews.text: Started on fire on 3rd use. If you decide to get this do not leave unattended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to set up and helps us sweat out our ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived fast and is exactly what I was looking for to detox. It's easy to set up and helps us sweat out our toxins like CRAZY!!! Expect to be soaking wet after 2O minutes. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Best purchase ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ummm. I am a sauna fanatic. This is the best thing I have ever bought. Easy to assemble and the heat is amazing. I love it!!! Edit. The worst part of this is that I love it so much I want to do it all the time!!!
customer_reviews.author: Messiahsez

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this sauna
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this sauna! It takes 5 minutes to set up, it heats up in about 15 minutes tops and it works incredible! I’m 6ft and 250 and I fit in there perfectly fine, the chair is good for the time spent in there as well. I’ve used it everyday since I received it, I look forward to using it daily!
customer_reviews.author: Susette

customer_reviews.title: Simply Sauna
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit skeptical that this would really give decent heat and make one sweat. Boy was I wrong. Got an excellent result and it was comfortable to sit in. My knees felt pretty good afterwards and I wasn't even thinking about pain relief. Also, on a cold night, it's great to sit in and warm up-an added bonus. Very easy to fold up and move about. I don't really see a down side except that you couldn't take it on a plane. But, hey, get a good hotel and they might have a hot tub or sauna.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Arvey

customer_reviews.title: Fire hazard!
customer_reviews.text: This was working absolutely great for a little over a month and a half until one session when the electrical unit started smoldering and producing electrical smoke after 15 minutes of use. Luckily we caught it and stopped it before it could start a fire.
customer_reviews.author: MikeN

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it to anyone with chronic pain
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item after I had a treatment at the Holistic Dr.'s office. My severe pain has ruled my life for over six years. The is only my third treatment and I cannot believe how different I feel when I get out of the Infrared Home Spa. I would recommend it to anyone with chronic pain. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Lenny

customer_reviews.title: Best.Purchase.Ever
customer_reviews.text: I am someone who frequents spa's to detox. The problem is I can't go very regularly. Enter this amazing personal Sauna. Since last week, I've truly realized how much easier it is to meditate in 140 degree heat. My mind justs shuts down. Amazing. Treat yourself and buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Prasker

customer_reviews.title: I approve it
customer_reviews.text: I bought my sauna to relieve my stress a little, it is comfortable and easy to assemble I did only in 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: sweet

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought a lot of stuff over the years & I must say, this is by far the best thing I’ve bought that I truly love using, It actually works in 30 mins, my mom is asking about it, so I might have to buy another one, since I use mines on the road in my truck. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Barry Alleyne

customer_reviews.title: I love this little sauna
customer_reviews.text: I love this little sauna! I purchased an infrared sauna to help with stiff joints and muscle aches. I was paying $35/mnth for a health spa simply to sit in their sauna, so the payout was totally worth it to me! You will definitely expel toxins in this thing! The sauna doesn't smell and was super easy t set up! I have it sitting on a carpeted floor in my bedroom where I can watch a t.v. program as I sweat! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: I feel deep detoxification going on in this thing! It took about 7 or 8 times using the sauna before; the damp, rosy glow I got, turned into all out pouring sweat by the end of my time, I set it for 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: ZsaZsa's mom

customer_reviews.title: Highly recomcomed. Hot enough to sweat
customer_reviews.text: It works excellently. Hot enough for me. I always sweat when I sit in there. I sit for 30 minutes every night. Great to lose weight. Easy to set up and store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the sauna!
customer_reviews.text: Trying to find time to head to the spa to use their infrared sauna became harder and harder. When I saw this SereneLife Portable Infrared I knew I would get my money's worth in just 1 treatment. Incredible and it makes a huge difference with my fibromyalgia.
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and it works
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit I was very skeptical, however I decided to take a chance and I'm glad i did. Its extremely easy to set up you literally just unfold it and its up. I was sweating the same way I would at the gym sauna, which is what i expected. The best part is it comes with a chair, so that part you dont have to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: $190 for 10 min use
customer_reviews.text: Used once and zipper came off. Ends are sewn in so no way to get it back on. Was easy enough to get sent back, but then was refunded with a “gift card” instead of the amount being credited back to my amazon card. Super disappointed with the entire transaction
customer_reviews.author: ShootingStar

customer_reviews.title: more than I expected
customer_reviews.text: it works better than I expected and i'm pleasantly surprised. I have recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Queen H

customer_reviews.title: liked it so much
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one on the East Coast for Detoxing, liked it so much, purchased another for the West Coast. It heats your core right away, is space saving, well made, pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Potentially dangerous
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive my sauna when it came yesterday. I used it yesterday and it was wonderful. While I was using it today, the back panel caught on fire. My husband’s hands were burned helping me get out of it quickly. This was only the second time I used it. It was a nice idea, but I would be afraid to try a portable sauna again. I’m returning it Monday.
customer_reviews.author: LMcNeal

customer_reviews.title: Returned because of strong plastic smell. The smell made ...
customer_reviews.text: Returned because of strong plastic smell. The smell made me sick.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this. Works great and I use it with my facia blaster
customer_reviews.author: Leisa C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Heats up really fast
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Heats up really fast. It's what I have been waiting for a long time. I paid 75.00 for one session of infrared blanket which is expensive. In the long run, it's a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: loss

customer_reviews.title: Detoxing is the main reason!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I use it for detox and weight loss. I have Lyme disease and infrared is highly recommended. A few ppl in our support group use this one too. It’s easy and portable. Effective.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrese Kragenbring

customer_reviews.title: Very good dry heat sauna and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived very fast. When I opened it looked nice. The outer material feels good. It does get very hot, make sure you're hydrated. For a dry heat sauna it is really good. Easy to use and set up. One Velcro strap, unfold it, and two bars that goes across the front. Plug it in and turn it on. The small folding chair that comes with it, its great size for it, and comfortable, thanks for throwing it in with the purchase. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Whiskey308

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: This was absolutely disgusting!!! This is my second try attempting to purchase one. This had no side panels, broken bars, some other persons glob of long hair in the neck velcro, how unsanitary!! The remote looked best up and the were staines on the food cushion...it smelt terrible!!!
customer_reviews.author: ATG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is so quick and easy to set up. The remote is nice, it controls the temp, optional footed heater and the timer for you to decide how long of a session you want. I usually feel cold and never sweat a lot, in this it took me a few minutes then I was sweating a lot just like your supposed to!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used 4 times and quit working
customer_reviews.text: I've been a customer of amazon and the products they support for years - I've never had much of a bad experience. I ordered this portable sauna and it quit working after 4 uses. It also isn't a product that is inexpensive. I'm not mad, just disappointed. Has nothing to do with amazon and has everything to do with SereneLife.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great- heats up quickly. easy to assemble and break down. Love!
customer_reviews.author: ADS

customer_reviews.title: Love it is flexible good size
customer_reviews.text: Love it is flexible good size , you can just put it in my closet or under bed,my experience is that it took me about 20 minutes to start sweating I was sitting their and nothing.after 20 minutes my body was sweating like crazy, but maybe is just my body I have always had a hard time sweating even when I’m running or exercising.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: happy with product
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised that's its so good. Didn't expect a portable unit to get so hot. Easy enough to set up and put down. Glad I went with dry over wet because it's easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: High EMF's
customer_reviews.text: We had a EMF specialist come out to test the EMF's on the portable infrared home spa - our son has had health issues and we did not want him to get into the sereneLife infrared until we knew the exact amount of EMF's. It was very high as much as sitting underneath a power line, were the words used by the specialists. We decided not to take the risk and return it unused.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy J.

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this! Super easy to set up and so ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! Super easy to set up and so quickly. I have recommended this product to all my friends. And it feels so good with the muscles and joints. LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love to relax in there Watch tv play my games on.my kindle I feel like its a treat, soothe my aches when I workout and OMG
customer_reviews.author: Cent

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This actually works. I was nurvious about it but my husband loves it
customer_reviews.author: tiffany sosa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Oh, how I wanted to love this, especially after reading the rave reviews. Set up was simple. The chair was a tad uncomfortable but not unbearable. The foot pad got really hot and I figured putting a towel on it would help. With all said, I still had high hopes. However, the sauna would cut off after eight minutes exactly. No matter what I tried, like clockwork, it would cut off. After a few days of the same issue and even having my husband to inspect, I decided to send back. I plan on ordering another one from a different brand and hopefully it will work but this one is definitely a no-go.
customer_reviews.author: Margaux

customer_reviews.title: It’s like I have access to a spa in my living ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything I wanted! Needs to air out a bit after opening and the zippers will burn you if you reach too far out of the arm pockets(just unzip the main zipper if you need to get something and you will be good) but other than those minor comments it’s a dream come true! It’s like I have access to a spa in my living room🙌🙌
customer_reviews.author: RachelGold

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with how well this works. Heats up nicely and works great. Love the portability of it too. I am drenched in sweat when I'm done. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Lea H.

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd sauna ( same one ) within 1 week. Both dont work appropriately. Neither one stays at the temperature that I set it at. If I set it to 90 degrees, it goes up to 110. In addition to the temperature not staying where it is supposed to, the 2nd one the heat light doesnt turn on. I am very disappointed and have to return the 2nd one now. What a pain to package these up and get them back. If anyone knows of a portable sauna that actually works, please feel free to comment here! Hope this review helps the next person decide not to go through the hassle of purchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: sarah c.

customer_reviews.title: VERY SHODDY CONSTRUCTION
customer_reviews.text: VERY cheaply made. Didn't even plug it in. As soon as I opened it the leg popped out of the joint. Folding tables are made sturdier than this. If the manufacturer can't get basic mechanics right, I'm not interested in testing the electrical components.
customer_reviews.author: Neekah77

customer_reviews.title: 10 Stars**********
customer_reviews.text: Awesome... I love it and it came quicker than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one use, company refused to honor their warranty.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift that I got for someone else. The heater broke after one use. Although the product was still under a published 1 year warranty, the company refused to honor it. In fact, they are very difficult to contact, but with persistance I was able to reach them three times. They kept saying they would send a return authorization for a warranty repair, but they never sent it and then they completely ghosted me.
customer_reviews.author: Amy A. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love my sauna! It feels like a real sauna and it’s so easy to use. Heats up in minutes easy storage and lightweight. Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweaty
customer_reviews.text: This product is very easy to assemble (take out the box and unfold). The max temp is 136 Degrees Farenheit and very tolerable, but the foot pad gets a little too hot for me. Luckily my focus isn't my feet! I sat in the sauna my body wrap and slimming lotion for about 30 mins and I was dripping wet!! I love it and will be making sure I get the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Rashea H.

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I was skeptical to purchase but this thing really works! Been in here 20 minutes and I’m POURING sweat! I never sweat this much. So happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Very necessary!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this sauna! It makes my body feel incredible! The sweat just pours off of me and my body stays warm even after I come out. Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heats up, could be perfected
customer_reviews.text: The sauna heats up nicely, is compact and lightweight, and matches the photographs. I do wish the foot pad could be removed as it is often in the way when I do not want it on. I also wish the inside was lined with a material that is easier to clean. Another issue - the description states it is an infrared sauna, but after asking question on the product page and not receiving an answer, I doubt that it is actually infrared. No light is emitted from the inside of the sauna. Also, there was a very intense off-gassing smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. I had a homemade hillbilly sauna before made with brooder lamps and was looking to upgrade. This model is sleek, lightweight, portable and so far works like a charm. I've seen other models at 4x the price. This fits great into a home workout/sweaty detox regimen!
customer_reviews.author: Marie S.

customer_reviews.title: Well made - easy to use - great results
customer_reviews.text: Recently diagnosed with mercury poisoning, my nutritionist recommended I get a portable infrared sauna to help move the mercury out of my body - I was very wary at first - but OMG do I love this item - I try to use it 5-6 times a week - I keep it in my bedroom and use it after dinner - watch TV for 30 min while inside - sweat pours off of me like nothing I've every experienced - after I get out I take 10 minutes to stretch as my muscles are totally limber - then a nice cool shower - I sleep like a baby. The calorie burn is a total added bonus!
customer_reviews.author: carol w.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: i love how easy it is to set up and put away. It takes about 10-15 mintues to warm up to the temp set. On first try it works I added a towel around my neck as one of the comments prior to me purchasing suggested. I haven't had it long and I can see the change in my body. Great price, quick delivery and very easy to use. Very happy and saitified with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cleanty Shulterbrandt

customer_reviews.title: Great portable Sauna
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sauna after reading about infrared therapy in "The Truth About Cancer". I've been using it for over a month and while I can't say for sure if it is helping shrink my tumor the tumor is shrinking and that is what matters. It is nice and compact and easy to travel with (like camping). I sit it in front of my couch every night and use it while watching TV or reading a book.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not built like they used to be.
customer_reviews.text: We bought a second serenelife sauna to have at a second location in the house best all of us loved the first one which was purchased over a year ago. Unfortunately we are somewhat disappointed as the cover for the second one is far smaller than the first. Indeed it is so small that it doesn’t fit the frame that goes into it well at all. This makes for a number of problems including just a general feeling of being crammed in. The first one we purchased has a nice roomy cover that slopes and sags comfortably in all the right places so that you can, for example, rest your drink right in the fold like a shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Starbird

customer_reviews.title: I recently ordered and it just arrived. I received ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered and it just arrived. I received no chair, even though it states in the description that a chair is included. There were also absolutely no instructions and info on how to use the device would be greatly appreciated. Not sure what to do now that I cant use it without a chair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can really get my foot into this I am ...
customer_reviews.text: I can really get my foot into this I am 6ft 2in 260lbs use chair provided plenty of shoulder room I thought I might need something taller not]1st day sauned twice 130d for 30m really get the sweat on I am 71 put towel on chair jumped in naked I know horrifying thought got it set up in living room no one to say I cant hope it holds up for a year I would buy another [love it Jr.
customer_reviews.author: Joe R.

customer_reviews.title: Get ready to sweat and detoxify!
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure if this product would work like everyone said. If it would really make me sweat alot and if it was worth the money. Well let me say this..it makes me sweat like crazy! The temperature goes up to 140..but I never have to put it that high to sweat.The chair is small but still pretty comfortable for me. Easy set up and clean up. I got the extended warranty just incase something goes wrong, definitely worth getting. Overall a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R

customer_reviews.title: Quality of kindergarten project. Essential pieces completely unusable on first use
customer_reviews.text: Used first time and essential zipper, which has quality of worst zipper I have ever seen, came apart and impossible to reconnect or make unit function able. Worst quality ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Jim McDonnell

customer_reviews.title: Does not get warm enough to break a sweat!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second zip up portable sauna. This one is a disappointment as it does heat up as well as my prior one. It says it goes up to 140 degrees but does not feel even close to that temperature - can sit in for an hour and not even break a sweat. With my old one within 10 minutes I was sweating.
customer_reviews.author: JCC

customer_reviews.title: Ugh failed after 5 months use
customer_reviews.text: It's not used a lot, but it's failed after only 5 months. What a waste of $. I wish I could give zero stars. No way to return it either.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Great portable sauna!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get my portable sauna that I used it the same day it arrived. It works great! The product is exactly as described. Buy one, you won't be sorry because its a great investment. I'm sure that I will get a lot of use out of this sauna.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High EMF
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble, and did the job as far as a portable sauna, but after owning it a couple of months, I purchased an EMF monitor, and found it to have very high EMF readings. I will not be using it anymore. Unfortunately, there isn't an option to return it at this point.
customer_reviews.author: HW

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I guess I Received a faulty unit. I was excited about all the positive reviews but mine stopped working and I’ve had it for 2 weeks. Worked great for maybe 10 usages. Now, nothing changed except when plugged in it won’t turn in. I have tried with different outlets and tested my plugs, they are not the problem. Just can’t get it to turn back on. Also, it’s a pretty big package and already thinking of the headache it’ll be trying to return It. Pretty frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: started smoking, small fire followed
customer_reviews.text: On my 4th use of the sauna, I started to feel a hot spot in the middle of my back. I thought it was a metal button or something that I was leaning against. So I kept leaning away from it. A few minutes later I started smelling smoke. I unzipped the unit, got out, only to find the sauna melting and burning on the back panel. A small fired started, I grab a towel and knocked the flame down and then poured my bottle of water over the melting plastic....really?...I really loved the first 3 uses. I really wanted this thing to work :(
customer_reviews.author: vol1

customer_reviews.title: Zipper is trash
customer_reviews.text: I have been through 3 of these and each time the zipper has broke. The sauna is useless once that happens. It is not a matter of "if", its a matter of when. It is a shame because the product works great, but it does not have anything to keep it sealed once the zipper breaks.
customer_reviews.author: ramone b.

customer_reviews.title: Spa Failed
customer_reviews.text: The spa that I purchased failed after about 6 months. I had used it only a few times. It quit heating and the displays on the controller went blank. The manufacturer repaired the unit in a timely fashion, but I had to pay shipping to and from the repair facility. That added almost 50% to the cost of the spa.
customer_reviews.author: E.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped heating after 3 months. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steve J.

customer_reviews.title: Wonky heat settings.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a year and have only used it a handful of times. It either won’t heat up to the temperature I set or heats ups, says it 140 degrees even though I can feel cold air near the front zippers while they are closed completely. Even my legs are still cool to the touch after 10 plus minutes! 10 more minutes and the heat is realllly hot and still says the same temperature then cools down again and still says the same temperature. I’m kinda disappointed as this was recommended by my ND as a detox protocol and I can’t even break a decent sweat in the thing with all of the weird temperature fluctuations.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Odd but perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a couple months now at least and love using it. I know it looks odd or even silly but it does what infrared sauna pods are supposed to do. I'm only able to do about 27 minutes at 117 right now but by the end I'm *DRIPPING*. I've used the clam shell style pods and they are great but this weird cube honestly does the same thing. Getting the rods in place (you'll know when you get yours) was tricky. I put the one that goes across and on top into place after getting into the pod. I'm loving this simple addition to my house.
customer_reviews.author: Twin 2

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I like it better than a real sauna because I can do a longer session since my head is not exposed to the heat. I sweat intensely. I purchased to help sweat out toxins and increase my energy levels. I was trying everything and I noticed the sauna seemed to help. Since this is dry heat I can gauge how much I’m sweating. I place a towel on the chair for comfort and I’m able to sit for an hour with little discomfort. Finally, those arm slits and pocket are so convienent. I use my phone, IPad, remote or even read a book and get a drink of water.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Silvers

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would call myself a bit of a sauna snob. I have joined a gym for the sole purpose of using a sauna. This product really blew me away. We had considered purchasing a larger unit and decided to give this a try for the price point. 121 degrees is the highest temp that I’ve had it up to, which appeared to be plenty warm enough. Takes approximately 20+ minutes to heat up. It was easy to assemble, works very well and appears easy to clean. To top it off, I can sit in front of the TV and watch ESPN while getting sauna time. Brilliant concept.
customer_reviews.author: OKC PRIME

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move
customer_reviews.text: The last few times we have used it, the heat seems to turn off even though its still on. When heat seems to turn off, we need to up the heat again in order for it to heat up again. Is this normal? No longer works - purchased 10/5/17 - sent email regarding heat not staying on in Decemeber - used it in April and no longer works at all. It’s under warranty, but unable to get a return call from the number I was provided.
customer_reviews.author: mom

customer_reviews.title: Make it hot!
customer_reviews.text: I was browsing for a full in home sauna when I discovered this at a tenth of the price. Gave it a shot, and I am thoroughly impressed. It gets up to temp in about 8 minutes, and makes you sweat (just like it should) the foot pad gets very hot, I only use the low setting and make sure to cover the chair and ground with towels for cleanup and to avoid burning yourself on the metal rivets in the chair. Solid little home product!
customer_reviews.author: JustBrian

customer_reviews.title: Feeling the huge detox impact after one use
customer_reviews.text: I feel effin amazing after using this! Easy set up, good quality, reached 140 degrees. I felt more drenched than jumping into a pool.. zippers for free hands helped. Already recommending to everyone. My skin looks way better after one use. I feel more energized and like I’m about to have a good nights rest.. I know that sounds contradicting but basically how you’d feel after a good work out but with way more sweat. Make sure you keep a glass of water nearby! Can’t wait to use again in the morning :)
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Dawn

customer_reviews.title: overall great product
customer_reviews.text: I just LOVE this sauna. Easy set up, heats up in 5 minutes. I am usually in the sauna for 60 minutes. I cool off for 20 and then take a shower and I feel so relaxed. I have used it 3 time since I received it and I my skin looks better. My 20 yr old daughter used it 2 times and she looks slimmer. I have to say... within 20 minutes of getting in the sauna I am sweating ... I mean the sweat is just dripping. I drink a lot of water to keep hydrated. I really recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Baez

customer_reviews.title: Item broke after using it 10 times
customer_reviews.text: The sauna broke in a month and half. Wouldn’t heat up anymore. Tried to contact Amazon but was past return window. There is no information online about contacting the company who sells the product. Would NOT recommend this product at all. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ashi

customer_reviews.title: Buy One, You Won't Regret It!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, just wow is all I can say! I started going to a local storefront infrared spa and as much as it was very enjoyable and provided relief, it was expensive compared to this one time purchase price of the SereneLife Infrared Home Spa! I have been using (the in-home spa) for 15-20 minutes every other day and I can tell you that it is enhancing the physical therapy I do at home. My PT alone provided strengthening but now I am also nearly pain-free! Buy one, you won't regret it!!
customer_reviews.author: China

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I have rewritten my review to reflect I no longer consider this a five star purchase. I purchased this product two months ago and use it on an average of twice a week. It No longer stays hot. It heats to 140 degrees then immediately starts The countdown to cool off. Initially I was so pleased with the performance that I purchased another one for a gift. I’m annoyed and disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Wish there was a little bit more space.
customer_reviews.text: I am 5"5 and my knees touch the front part of the tent, which is fine because i usually clean those parts with damp towels after each use but something to keep in mind. You could move the chair a little bit more to the back but if your back touches the tent it could get really hot. I wish there was a little bit more room so i could have some freedom ie. Cross legs but overall, a great product. Would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: You want this sauna!!
customer_reviews.text: So for all the skeptics, I actually tried it BEFORE leaving the review The sauna heats up really quickly and I was sweating at the brow within 5 minutes inside. You will be surprised how much you sweet and how quickly you get to being a complete sweaty mess! I strongly advise using a beach towel to cover the chair and the mesh. I imagine over time the foam will start to smell of sweat. I will continue to use this to improve my overall health. My husband and I are excited to finally be able to cancel gym memberships!!! The SereneLife Portable Infrared Home Spa is just what we needed to complete our home gym!
customer_reviews.author: Felecia

customer_reviews.title: Genius home sauna solution -  simple, affordable, and works great!
customer_reviews.text: What a smart and simple home infrared sauna solution. I have joined gyms just to have access to a sauna and now I have the convenience of having one in my own home. It took less than 5 minutes to set up and I was all set up for a very satisfying session in my sauna.
customer_reviews.author: apple

customer_reviews.title: So far I like my SerenLife portable infrared sauna
customer_reviews.text: So far I like my SerenLife portable infrared sauna. I have used it 3 times and am starting out at a low temp and and time setting but am anticipating an increase overtime. It is convenient, relaxing and easy to use. I wish the instructions were clearer on set-up, operation and breakdown. After going over it several times I was ok. It would be a nice addition to include tips and guidelines to taking a sauna for the novice. My only concern regards the tension placed on the zipper near the floor. Once the lower stabilizing bar is in place and you enter the sauna it is a snug pull on the zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Primrose

customer_reviews.title: This Sauna is fantastic! Don't worry if 15 minutes pass and you ...
customer_reviews.text: This Sauna is fantastic! Don't worry if 15 minutes pass and you have not started sweating, because at 20 minutes you begin to sweat like crazy! If you place a white towel on the chair in the Sauna, you can visibly see the toxins that come out of your body. I feel very refreshed after exiting the Sauna. I love it, so I spend 45 minutes in it. Just get out if you start feeling uncomfortable. I'm am going to buy another one right now to gift to someone I love dearly.
customer_reviews.author: The Beauty of Hope

customer_reviews.title: The chemical fumes from melting plastic and other materials this ...
customer_reviews.text: The chemical fumes from melting plastic and other materials this product is made with is so overpowering and dizzying. It’s a shame because it did seem to heat up but what’s the point of sweating out chemicals if we have to force our lungs to fill up with toxic fumes in exchange? Returning.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't get to 140 degrees but works well. Does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Best Personal Spa (Sauna) Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I took a chance on this product. I was reluctant even after ALL of the amazing reviews. Let’s just say A M A Z I N G!!!! I definitely reaches the 140 degrees and the foot pad does get super hot. I wore two pair of socks and it was still on fire (that’s a bonus for me) I was sweating sooooo good. Thank you to SereneLife for making such a great compact piece of art for people who can’t afford the gym or going to a spa. I’m definitely HAPPY. Amazon Thanks for the amazing delivery and properly handling my package. Five Star Rating All Around ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Clutch Purse Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: The real deal!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited because of the reviews and there is no disappointment here! It gets warm in 10 minutes and then does a gradual heating so you aren't overwhelmed. The sweat sneaks up on you and then Game On! Worth every penny to be able to do this at home. My lady and I have joint and muscle pains so this is already helping. Drink lots of water!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Ball

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately...Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: So I wanted to have/use for 3 months to write a proper review. 1. It does get hot but not hot enough to make you sweat like a “real” infrared sauna. I sit in it for 30 minutes at 135 and only my back (where the heat element is located) gets sweaty. 2. The smell hasn’t gone away. It’s a heated plastic odor that is a bit obnoxious. 3. The chair that came with it broke. Specifically, the plastic corner screw cap and it looked like it stripped possibly due to the heat exposure. Overall it’s an okay device for body aches but should not be considered a true sauna by any means.
customer_reviews.author: Monitabonita

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a nice little sauna, HOWEVER. I received no instructions or guidance for its assembly (although, it's not too complicated). Also, I didn't even get to use it-- I was zipping it up to try it out, and the zipper pull broke. It completely came off the tracks, and since it's plastic there's no fix. Bummer. I was really excited about this product but it looks like i'll be sending it back :(
customer_reviews.author: RaccoonHands

customer_reviews.title: Smells like it’s melting
customer_reviews.text: I just received this I have used it a few times and all though it feels good it smells so much like it’s burning or melting I’m really confused if this is normal or safe ??? The fumes are pretty strong inside the suit I hope to receive another one that doesn’t smell like it’s about to catch on fire ..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: smell is worrisome
customer_reviews.text: The plastic burning smell is pretty bad. I'm using it to detox and I'm not sure it doesn't actually expose me to more toxins in the process...
customer_reviews.author: Jane G

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My sister in law recommended I purchase this sauna. She absolutely loved it so I did although I was sceptical. How could such an inexpensive sauna be effective? Is this gonna just be this thing that sits in my house that I never use? Will it even work? Well the answers are yes, no and yes. I received it and it was easy to assemble, heated quickly, was comfortable to sit in and it folds up easily. I love it. I feel great after using it and I am thrilled with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M Rydell

customer_reviews.title: very impressive
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a regular wood infrared sauana but had to get rid of it to make space in a spare room. I happened upon this unit with low expectations, but have been blown away. I honestly can't come up with 1 pro the full sized wood infrared sauna has on this. It heats up in 2 minutes, there are 4 different heating elements, it folds up very easily, and is easy to clean. I usually sit in the gym steam room and dry sauana and dont sweat nearly as much as I do in this portable sauana. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: cool name

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap materials. Broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: The first time I tried to use it the zipper broke. Very cheap zipper, cannot resist the tension necessary to close the sauna
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for so many issues
customer_reviews.text: I suffer with chronic Lyme disease so this unit helps me with pain and discomfort. Heats to 140 F pretty quickly. I have the support bar at the bottom but don't bother with the upper bar. I have issues with claustrophobia and the first few times I used it I never let go of the zipper in case I had to get out quickly. I fold the neck wrap downwards and it works just as well. I sit in for 20 minutes and watch Youtube videos. My wife sneaks and takes pictures of me...calls me the "Talking Head". I highly recommend this to anyone suffering with pain and Lyme.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Cozy heat and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for detoxing, fascia blasting, reduction of pain from fibromyalgia and inflammation. It’s temp controls go up to 140F, so it gets plenty toasty! The footpad gets really hot, recommend putting a towel over it. Instructions were very helpful and easy to follow. Setup was quick and simple. It is lightweight, and easy to move around. I agree with other reviews that say it is small, but I bought the right size for me, so I am definitely happy with it. One of my cats was super curious about it, so I let him sit on my lap for a couple minutes... he seemed to think the cozy heat was divine.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Jones

customer_reviews.title: The wooden saunas aren't nearly as good as these portable ones!
customer_reviews.text: The sauna is amazing! I used to have one of those big wooden infrared saunas that was very uncomfortable to sit in. It was also a pain in the butt to move! And you had to keep it somewhere private so no one could see you inside naked. This sauna heats up way faster and was so comfortable to sit in. I used one of those airplane pillows to hold my head up and I just pushed it up against the wall. I almost fell asleep it was so comfortable. I have never sweat like that in my other sauna. I would definitely recommend this especially at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Feels amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up, right out of the box I was using it in about 10 minutes. Instructions for the controller are easy to understand as well. The heat feels wonderful! Eases my chronic pain, and with the release of topics, I am happy to have purchased this! I was paying $35 an hour for the use of a unit like this at a local spa, now I save money and can relax in the privacy of my own home.
customer_reviews.author: LJD

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review/ Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: The zipper has broken in less than a year. Bought this Dec 31,2017. 7 months to be exact with very light use. Very disappointed in the quality. Zipper is a pretty important part of the sauna, without a proper seal it is pointless. Don’t waste your money!!! Update 9-4-16 Received a phone call willing to give my money back or replace sauna. I chose replacement and it got here very fast. I think this one should last longer! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best with a towel
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with my sauna! It heats up within minutes and I love that you can regulate the actual temperature as opposed to others that just have low-medium-high options. Little trick, I lay down a towel on the chair for comfort and easy cleanup and I also use a smaller towel around my neck to fill out the space.
customer_reviews.author: J. Concepcion

customer_reviews.title: It Gets Hot
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once. It was really easy to assemble. The included chair is pretty comfortable but the amount of heat that is generated is amazing. I had on a shirt and knee length leggings and was covered in sweat after 30 minutes . Most of the heat come from the back panel but a heated foot pad is included. I felt really relaxed and had a great night's sleep..would recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Levy's daughter

product_meta.title: SereneLife Portable Infrared Home Spa, One Person Sauna, Heating Foot Pad and Chair, Silver (SLISAU10SL)
product_meta.description: Color:SilverTo enhance your quick sauna sessions, our portable sauna tent has been outfitted with small remote that features an automatic heat setting and a timer, allowing you to customize the steam according to your preference. The portable infrared sauna can be programmed for steaming sessions up to 60 minutes and temps reach a max of 140 degrees (Fahrenheit).We have even upgraded the energy-efficient one person sauna with a zippered easy access openings that let you flip through books or magazines, shuffle music and text while you sweat!No other portable sauna room is as easy to use as ours. When packed up, the portable sauna steam pot weighs only 20 lbs, so you'll have no problem carrying it around. Use it to treat clients of your mobile spa, or to relax at home. A portable sauna steamer can change your life. But this deal won't last forever. Hurry up and place your order now!Power Output: 1050 Watt Max Temperature: 140°FPower: 120V Total Weight: 20 lbs. Time Setting: Up to 1 hour (60 minutes) Dimensions When Assembled: 27.6’’ long x 31.5’’ wide x 37.8’’ deep
feature_bullets: #1 PERSONAL SAUNA: Can’t get to the spa but want to experience the benefits of sauna therapy? No problem This indoor sauna kit comes with everything you need to get your sauna on in the comfort of your own home
PORTABLE SAUNA UNIT: Have a mobile beauty spa or want to move your sauna dome from one room to another? Our infrared sauna is conveniently portable You can pick it up or pack it up when need
ENJOY AND RELAX: Use this sauna to relax after a day of work, while reading books, listening to music, play on your mobile phone, watch movies and so on
INCLUDES SAUNA CHAIR: While other saunas require you to build your own sauna room using your own stool or chair, our portable sauna comes with a comfortable (and foldable) sauna chair
SAVE MONEY ON BEAUTY SALON : the mini sauna room can service for a long time and save your money to pay to beauty salon shop

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,428 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
